title: Episode 247: Christian Theater, Chuck Colson & Bad DJ’s w/Tim Gregory
description: Skye and Phil sit down with writer, director and actor Tim Gregory to talk about his new Chicago stage play based on the life of - believe it or not - Chuck Colson!  Plus Christians have some strange beliefs in the UK and what NOT to put in your DJ mix in the Middle East!
